message:
This previous response from [Chad] failed to parse!: 'Dave, I understand now that there has been a mistake in our communication. It seems that bread_slice1 is not on the cutting board as we previously thought. Since I am holding the tomato and cannot PUT it on bread_slice1, I will WAIT this round. You should PICK bread_slice1 since it is on your side and then PUT it on the cutting board in the next round.

EXECUTE
NAME Chad ACTION WAIT
NAME Dave ACTION PICK bread_slice1'
Robot Dave is already holding an object, can't pick another one. Re-format to strictly follow [Action Output Instruction]!

Dave, I understand now that there has been a mistake in our communication. It seems that bread_slice1 is not on the cutting board as we previously thought. Since I am holding the tomato and cannot PUT it on bread_slice1, I will WAIT this round. You should PICK bread_slice1 since it is on your side and then PUT it on the cutting board in the next round.

EXECUTE
NAME Chad ACTION WAIT
NAME Dave ACTION PICK bread_slice1
